questions.description: This question will be resolved based on the final edit to Wikipedia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_vetoed_United_Nations_Security_Council_resolutions made one week after the period of interest.
questions.name: How many United Nations Security Council Resolutions concerning Syria will be vetoed by Russia between 22 April 2018 and 22 August 2018?

answers.name: None

answers.name: More than 2

questions.description: This question will be resolved using the approval rate reported for the time of interest on Nippon Hōsō Kyōkai (NHK)'s website (https://www.nhk.or.jp/bunken/research/yoron/political/2018.html). The cabinet approval rate is reported as 支持する (Support to) in the first table 内閣：安倍内閣 (Cabinet: Abe Cabinet) on that page. Months are indicated by their corresponding number (e.g. 1月 = January). If NHK conducts more than one survey in a month, question resolution will be based on the first set of results posted. The question will be resolved using Google Translate services.
questions.name: What will be the approval rate for Japan's cabinet in NHK's monthly survey in June 2018?

answers.name: Less than 35
answers.question_name: What will be the approval rate for Japan's cabinet in NHK's monthly survey in June 2018?

answers.name: Between 35 and 43, inclusive
answers.question_name: What will be the approval rate for Japan's cabinet in NHK's monthly survey in June 2018?

answers.name: More than 43 but less than 49
answers.question_name: What will be the approval rate for Japan's cabinet in NHK's monthly survey in June 2018?

answers.name: Between 49 and 57, inclusive
answers.question_name: What will be the approval rate for Japan's cabinet in NHK's monthly survey in June 2018?

answers.name: More than 57
answers.question_name: What will be the approval rate for Japan's cabinet in NHK's monthly survey in June 2018?

questions.description: This question will be resolved using data from the International Monetary Fund (http://data.imf.org/regular.aspx?key=61015893), and can be found after ensuring the country of interest is selected from the Country drop down menu, and 'Consumer Price Index, All Items' is selected from the Indicator drop down menu. The relevant row is 'Benin, Consumer Price Index, All Items,' and the relevant column is '2018M04.' Question will be resolved based on initially reported values.

questions.description: The disease must have been contracted in the country of interest for this question to resolve as "yes." Imported cases (e.g., where the patient traveled to an endemic country, contracted the disease, and brought it home) do not meet the resolution criteria, though a locally-transmitted case which originates from an imported case does. If there is no indication of whether a case was locally-transmitted, this question will resolve as “no.”
questions.name: Will there be a locally-transmitted case of the Zika virus in Singapore between 1 April 2018 and 31 May 2018?

answers.name: Yes
answers.question_name: Will there be a locally-transmitted case of the Zika virus in Singapore between 1 April 2018 and 31 May 2018?

questions.description: FluNet is the World Health Organization's global web-based tool for influenza virological surveillance. To access relevant data at http://apps.who.int/flumart/Default?ReportNo=12 make the following selections: - Select by: 'Country, area or territory'; - Filter by: Country of interest, - Year from: '2018', Week from: '1', - Year to: '2018' Week to: '53', - Click 'Display report.' This question will be resolved by using the sum of values reported in the ‘Total number of influenza positive viruses’ (or .csv ‘ALL_INF’) column for the country of interest for all reporting weeks within the period of interest. Question will be resolved based on data available four weeks after the last day of the period of interest. If no data are available four weeks after close, question will be resolved as soon as data are released.
questions.name: How many positive influenza virus detections will FluNet record for Argentina between 9 July 2018 and 15 July 2018 (epidemiological week 28)?

answers.name: Less than 60
answers.question_name: How many positive influenza virus detections will FluNet record for Argentina between 9 July 2018 and 15 July 2018 (epidemiological week 28)?

answers.name: Between 60 and 170, inclusive
answers.question_name: How many positive influenza virus detections will FluNet record for Argentina between 9 July 2018 and 15 July 2018 (epidemiological week 28)?

answers.name: More than 170 but less than 270
answers.question_name: How many positive influenza virus detections will FluNet record for Argentina between 9 July 2018 and 15 July 2018 (epidemiological week 28)?

answers.name: Between 270 and 390, inclusive
answers.question_name: How many positive influenza virus detections will FluNet record for Argentina between 9 July 2018 and 15 July 2018 (epidemiological week 28)?

answers.name: More than 390
answers.question_name: How many positive influenza virus detections will FluNet record for Argentina between 9 July 2018 and 15 July 2018 (epidemiological week 28)?

questions.description: The U.S. proposed three defense foundational agreements -- the Logistics Supply Agreement (LSA), the Basic Exchange and Cooperation Agreement (BECA), and the Communications Compatibility and Security Arrangement (COMCASA), earlier called the Communication Interoperability and Security Memorandum Agreement (CISMOA) (The Diplomat, The Diplomat). India signed the LSA in August 2016, but it has not yet agreed to the other two (Defense News, India Times). Renaming of the BECA or COMCASA agreements will not affect the resolution of this question.
questions.name: Before 8 September 2018, will India sign either of the two remaining defense foundational agreements with the U.S.?

answers.name: Yes, both
answers.question_name: Before 8 September 2018, will India sign either of the two remaining defense foundational agreements with the U.S.?

answers.name: Yes, BECA only
answers.question_name: Before 8 September 2018, will India sign either of the two remaining defense foundational agreements with the U.S.?

answers.name: Yes, COMCASA only
answers.question_name: Before 8 September 2018, will India sign either of the two remaining defense foundational agreements with the U.S.?

answers.name: No
answers.question_name: Before 8 September 2018, will India sign either of the two remaining defense foundational agreements with the U.S.?

questions.description: RCEP is a regional trade agreement between Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) members and their free trade agreement partners (ASEAN, Business Standard). Countries participating in the trade initiative failed to conclude a deal in 2017 but hope to have an agreement soon (ABS-CBN, 10ThousandCouple). Ratification by the parties to the agreement is not required.
questions.name: Before 8 September 2018, will negotiators announce the completion of the Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership (RCEP) free trade agreement?

answers.name: Yes
answers.question_name: Before 8 September 2018, will negotiators announce the completion of the Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership (RCEP) free trade agreement?
